page.title: 12RECREATION - SPORTS
page.content: In Leyburn there are two{cricket {pitches}which are situated at the { {rugby ground}on Wensley Road, one { {cricket pitch}at the{cricket field}and one pitch at{Wensleydale School.} There are two{rugby pitches}at the { {rugby ground.}There is a {BMX}track in the playing field. {Tennis}is played in the town on courts at the rear of {St. Matthew's Terrace. There is an indoor {Squash Club}in Grove Square which has four courts and a {Sauna.}The squash club has been open for five years. To be a member it costs adults {Â£6}a year, children from ten to sixteen pay {Â£3 }a year. There is a deposit to pay for a locker key.
